l_navigator_delete Delete a Navigator

#### Description 

Removes a navigator from a graph widget

#### Usage
<pre><code>

l_navigator_delete(widget, id)

</code></pre>
#### Arguments 

widget graph widget
id navigator handle or navigator id

#### See Also
l_navigator_add
